languages.text: "Раз ты намерен бежать, отпусти моих спутников".
"Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."
languages.original_text: "Раз ты намерен бежать, отпусти моих спутников".

traits.locale_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."
"Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."
"Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."
"Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."
"Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."
"Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

languages.text: « Si vous avez l'intention de fuir, autant libérer mes compagnons. »
languages.original_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous avez l'intention de fuir, autant libérer mes compagnons. »

languages.text: “既然你都打算跑路了，那就把我的同伴放出来吧。”
languages.original_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

traits.locale_text: “立刻释放我的同伴们，把他们全都放了！”

languages.text: "Da Ihr vorhabt, zu fliehen, könnt Ihr meine Gefährten ebenso freilassen."
languages.original_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

languages.text: «Ya que vas a huir, podrías liberar a mis compañeros».
languages.original_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

languages.text: 「逃げるつもりならば、私の仲間を解放した方がいい」
languages.original_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

traits.locale_text: 「仲間たちを解放しろ。全員だ！」

languages.text: "Madem kaçma niyetindesin, yoldaşlarımı da serbest bırakıver."
languages.original_text: "Since you are intent on fleeing, you might as well release my companions."

traits.locale_text: "Madem kaçma niyetindesin, yoldaşlarımı da serbest bırakıver."
